Experience Chicago through Instagram

10 Dec 13

Since the amount (just a few) of people sharing pictures on Instagram with Lollapalooza hashtag isn't the same as when the event was happening I decided to create Chicagogram.us with the hashtag #chicago #chicagogram therefore lots of people sharing different pictures of Chicago and selfies of course.

I'm using the same code (I did some code refactor) and changed/removed some stuff from the layout as a developer standpoint.

Enjoy!
